黬黬黬

黬字的基本解释

黬
yǎn
黑斑；霉点：“衣渍度梅黬。”

黬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《廣韻》古咸切，平咸，見。］
［《廣韻》五咸切，平咸，疑。］
(1)黑色的痣。
(2)黑色的斑点。

黬字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【黑字部】　黬； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1521第12
【廣韻】五咸切【集韻】魚咸切，?音嵒。【玉篇】釜底黑也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?古咸切，音緘。義同。　又【集韻】【正韻】乙減切【韻會】幺減切，?音黯。【集韻】直聚氣也。【莊子·庚桑楚】有生黬也。　又【正韻】痕也。　又【集韻】鄔感切，音暗。義同。　又於琰切，音黶。中黑也。【六書·㴑原】與黚同。

黬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
黬字的起名意思

暂无。

Silk
Basic explanation of words
Silk
yǎn
Dark spots; mildew spots: "Clothes are stained with plums."
Silk
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Guangyun" ancient Xian cut, flat Xian, see. ]
["Guangyun" five salty cuts, flat salty, suspicious. ]
(1) Black mole.
(2) Black spots.
Silk
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Black Word Department] 　黬; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1521 Page 12
[Guangyun] Five salty cuts [Jiyun] Salted fish cuts,? Yinyan. [Jade articles] The bottom of the kettle is also black.　[Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Ancient Xianqie, with sound. The same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Yi reduced cut [Yun Hui] Unit reduced cut,? Sound dark. [Ji Yun] Straighten together. [Zhuangzi·Geng Sangchu] There is a sacred hair.　【Zheng Yun】Hen also.　[Jiyun] Wu feels cut, the sound is dark. The same meaning.　 Yu Yanqie again, the sound. Medium black also. 【Six Books·㴑原】Same as Bian.
